fort-st-john-plateau.name: Highway Camp
fort-st-john-plateau.description: The staging area where Highway 97 meets the access road. Last chance for civilization.

fort-st-john-plateau.name: Pipeline Crossing
fort-st-john-plateau.description: The road crosses over the main gas pipeline. Heavy truck traffic.

fort-st-john-plateau.name: Muskeg Flats
fort-st-john-plateau.description: Treacherous peatland that swallows machinery whole if you stray from the road.

fort-st-john-plateau.name: Doig River Camp
fort-st-john-plateau.description: Camp near Doig River First Nation territory. Community relations are key here.

fort-st-john-plateau.name: Spruce Ridge
fort-st-john-plateau.description: Climbing up through dense spruce forest. The grade gets steep.

fort-st-john-plateau.name: Plateau Summit
fort-st-john-plateau.description: Top of the plateau. Wind howls across the exposed landscape.

fort-st-john-plateau.name: Block A-7 Landing
fort-st-john-plateau.description: Active cutblock with equipment staging. Resupply possible from other crews.

fort-st-john-plateau.name: Wetland Bypass
fort-st-john-plateau.description: A long detour around sensitive wetland habitat.

fort-st-john-plateau.name: Gas Well Access
fort-st-john-plateau.description: Industrial access road serving several gas wells. Watch for tanker trucks.

fort-st-john-plateau.name: North Muskeg
fort-st-john-plateau.description: More peatland. Someone got a Cat stuck here last spring.

fort-st-john-plateau.name: Caribou Flats
fort-st-john-plateau.description: Open area frequented by caribou herds. Tread carefully during migration.

fort-st-john-plateau.name: Final Destination - Block A-12
fort-st-john-plateau.description: You've reached the target block. Time to set up base camp.

muskwa-foothills.name: Fort Nelson Staging
muskwa-foothills.description: The last town before wilderness. Stock up while you can.

muskwa-foothills.name: Alaska Highway Turnoff
muskwa-foothills.description: Leaving the main highway onto a forest service road.

muskwa-foothills.name: Prophet River
muskwa-foothills.description: Major river crossing. Check water levels before attempting.

muskwa-foothills.name: Foothills Camp
muskwa-foothills.description: Entering the foothills. Terrain gets rougher from here.

muskwa-foothills.name: Permafrost Zone
muskwa-foothills.description: Ground shifts and heaves. The road surface is unpredictable.

muskwa-foothills.name: Caribou Corridor
muskwa-foothills.description: Critical caribou migration route. Operations may be restricted.

muskwa-foothills.name: Mountain Pass
muskwa-foothills.description: Steep climb through a narrow pass. No room for error.

muskwa-foothills.name: Alpine Meadow
muskwa-foothills.description: Brief respite in a high alpine meadow. Beautiful but exposed.

muskwa-foothills.name: Remote Camp Alpha
muskwa-foothills.description: Helicopter-supplied remote camp. Limited resupply possible.

muskwa-foothills.name: Grizzly Creek
muskwa-foothills.description: Named for obvious reasons. Stay alert.

muskwa-foothills.name: Final Ridge
muskwa-foothills.description: Last climb before the destination. Crew is getting tired.

muskwa-foothills.name: Muskwa Summit Block
muskwa-foothills.description: You've made it to the most remote block in the district.
